skins.shipDescription: Northampton-class Heavy Cruiser ¨C Northampton, Hull Number CA-26!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Northampton, a Washington Treaty cruiser. I participated in the Doolittle Raid and the Battle of Midway, and I've earned 6 battle stars. I regret not being able to bring Hornet back home in one piece...
skins.acquisition: Hm? Oh hey, Commander. If you can accurately predict where I'm gonna show up, then maybe we're in sync with each other... If only Hornet and I could be like that... *Sigh*...
skins.login: With proper training, I think we could make quite the team, Commander.
skins.details: My armor's gotten thicker, but it feels like I'm more exposed than before...
skins.secretaryIdle1: You'll start to calm down if you just sit and listen to the waves...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Houston, you're too loud! Pipe the hell down!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hold on, I'm thinking about something...
skins.secretaryTouch: Um, I'm a... little ticklish right there...
